Name: Calista Luxury Resort
Description: This luxurious design hotel is situated directly on a private beach in the popular holiday region of Belek. Antalya Airport is approximately 27 km away, the centre of the regional capital 35 km. The hotel features 600 guest rooms, 24-hours reception, express check-in and check-out, concierge service, currency exchange, conference facilities, free WIFI, 3 outdoor pools, indoor pool, playground, fitness centre, exceptional spa and wellness, sports facilities (especially water sports), 11 restaurants, 9 bars, medical assistance, car hire and free on-site parking. Facilities for disabled guests.
